title: Junior Software Developer
description:
Junior/Entry-Level Software Developer

Ideal candidate will be highly motivated with an interest in the financial services industry and maintains a strong passion for coding. This individual will also have a solid foundation in root programming practices. The right candidate will be prepared to both code new projects as well as support legacy processes. They should demonstrate self-motivation to take on new challenges and show ownership to fulfill obligations while gaining the knowledge needed to become a productive member of the team.

The right individual will become part of a highly productive, tight-knit team. They will quickly gain hands on experience with a variety of technologies and will be exposed to broad ideas and information related to the firmâ€™s business. This position is ideal for someone with a broad skillset, desires visibility and greater impact on providing solutions, and wants to successfully contribute to the growth of a business.

 

Responsibilities

Develop and support applications throughout the full SDLC

Continuous support of processes built by yourself and other team members

Ability to document processes and business concepts

Work effectively both independently and within a team

Work nonstandard hours and days when required(preferably an early riser)

 

Minimum Requirements

Bachelor's degree in computer science, related discipline, or equivalent work experience.

1 year continuous experience. 

*We would consider coop work and strong internships as experience for someone who has the proper level of understanding or working in a corporate environment.

 

Preferred Qualifications

C#

SQL

Understanding of Design Patterns

Understanding of Microservice Based Architecture
